titles.title: Diesel Fuel Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to immediately terminate the excise tax on diesel fuel and the tax credits for ethanol and other alcohol fuels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/7/2008--Introduced. Diesel Fuel Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to terminate the excise tax on diesel fuel, the excise tax credit for ethanol, and the income tax credit for alcohol used as fuel.
